00023 #include <pdbtraj.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/format.hpp>

00026 namespace loos {
00027   void PDBTraj::rewindImpl(void) { seekFrame(0); }
00028   uint PDBTraj::nframes(void) const { return(_nframes); }
00029   uint PDBTraj::natoms(void) const { return(_natoms); }
00030 
00031 
00032   void PDBTraj::updateGroupCoords(AtomicGroup& g) {
00033 
00034     if (g.size() == frame.size()) {
00035       g.copyCoordinates(frame);
00036     } else {
00037       for (AtomicGroup::iterator i = g.begin(); i != g.end(); ++i) {
00038         int idx = (*i)->id() - 1;
00039         (*i)->coords(frame[idx]->coords());
00040       }
00041     }
00042   }
00043 
00044   bool PDBTraj::hasPeriodicBox(void) const { return(frame.isPeriodic()); }
00045   GCoord PDBTraj::periodicBox(void) const { return(frame.periodicBox()); }
00046   float PDBTraj::timestep(void) const { return(0.001); }
00047   std::string PDBTraj::currentName(void) const { return(current_name); }
00048   PDB PDBTraj::currentFrame(void) const { return(frame); }
00049   
00050 
00051   void PDBTraj::init(void) {
00052     seekFrame(0);
00053     parseFrame();
00054     _natoms = frame.size();
00055     _nframes = (end - start) / stride + 1;
00056   }
00057 
00058 
00059   void PDBTraj::seekFrameImpl(const uint i) {
00060 
00061     uint idx = i * stride + start;
00062     if (idx < start || i > end)
00063       throw(std::runtime_error("Error- Attempting to access more frames than are in the trajectory."));
00064 
00065     std::stringstream s;
00066     s << boost::format(pattern) % idx;
00067     current_name = s.str();
00068     ifs.setStream(current_name);
00069     current_index = i;
00070     at_end = false;
00071   }
00072 
00073 
00074   void PDBTraj::seekNextFrameImpl(void) {
00075     if (at_end)
00076       return;
00077 
00078     if (current_index >= _nframes)
00079       at_end = true;
00080     else {
00081       seekFrame(current_index);
00082       ++current_index;
00083     }
00084   }
00085 
00086 
00087   bool PDBTraj::parseFrame(void) {
00088 
00089     if (at_end)
00090       return(false);
00091   
00092     PDB newframe;
00093     newframe.read(*(ifs()));
00094     frame = newframe;
00095     if (frame.size() == 0) {
00096       at_end = true;
00097       return(false);
00098     }
00099 
00100     return(true);
00101   }
00102 
00103 
00104 
00105   std::vector<GCoord> PDBTraj::coords(void) {
00106     std::vector<GCoord> result(_natoms);
00107 
00108     for (uint i=0; i<_natoms; i++)
00109       result[i] = frame[i]->coords();
00110 
00111     return(result);
00112   }
